Text.Page:
The creatures of this wood bond with the faeries, acting as companions and guardians both. They protect the fey against outsiders, even your federation.

But since the epidemic started circulating, the gutripper sabertooths have turned against the healthy faeries, too!

Could you trim them back for us?

Thank you. I see fewer gutripper sabertooths around.

I am both saddened and relieved. You did what had to be done.
